attributes.action: Scrap the Road Fund Licence, we pay enough tax on fuel. we all use fuel.??
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Goverment charges 35p a ltr more than france. france as no road tax!! there goverment survives, why do brits leave the uk everyday?? our goverment dont know. maybe we need to remind them! Scrap road tax.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/road-tax-duty/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
